title: Quorn chilli in a jiffy
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons garlic infused olive oil', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 yellow pepper, chopped', '2 teaspoons cumin seeds, crushed', '1 (300g) pack frozen quorn mince', '1 (350g) jar tomato and chilli pasta sauce', '150ml water', '1 (410g) tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed']
